make_metabolite_table(input = input_report) %>% #defined in setup
  gt::gt() %>% 
  gt::cols_hide(columns = c("gene_name", "gene_accession")) %>% 
  gt::cols_label(
    metabolite_name = "Metabolite", 
    metabolite_accession = "HMDB Accession"
  ) %>% 
  gt::tab_options(table.width = gt::pct(100))

This metabolite table shows metabolites known to associate with `r params$content`, as curated by the Human Metabolome Database (HMDB).
